Check-in early to get your order when you arrive. Please park in a DriveUp & Go™ spot, where an associate will greet you. To receive your order, present this code: 0337

Safeway: Your order is ready and can be picked up anytime before 8PM. Check in early: http://safewayqa.onelink.me/ZdH8/1jfzt7wd . Park in a DriveUp & Go spot. An Associate will bring out your order once you’ve checked in. Show your code 0337 to receive your order.

When the customer receives a 4-digit verification code, they can locate it three different ways, email, text and in app.
\n \n Below are examples of each with the code highlighted in yellow:
Your order is ready for pickup!
Show code through window to associate.
Please have your trunk open for contact-free loading. We may call you to coordinate pickup.
Your wait time could be up to 5 minutes, we appreciate your patience.
